definition: festival season
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 期[qi1]/period/cycle
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
elongation stage/jointing stage (agriculture)

sentences.english: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple, and taught.
sentences.chinese: 到了节期，耶稣上殿里去教训人。

sentences.english: Ye observe days, and months, and times, and years.
sentences.chinese: 你们谨守日子，月分，节期，年分。

sentences.english: The purpose of this section is to note the importance of presentation as the final step in the design process.
sentences.chinese: 本节期于强调设计过程中最后举行书契说明的重要性。

sentences.english: Then the Jews sought him at the feast, and said, Where is he?
sentences.chinese: 正在节期，犹太人寻梢耶稣说，他在那里。

sentences.english: It did good for increasing seeds yield. The key period which affected seeds yield was from tillering to jointing.
sentences.chinese: 分蘖期至拔节期是影响种子产量最关键时期。

sentences.english: Normally during the Ching Ming Festival two-day or day before.
sentences.chinese: 节期一般在清明前两日或一日。

sentences.english: The suitable time of the chemical spraying should be among the standing to jointing stage.
sentences.chinese: 喷施时期宜在小麦起身期和拔节期。

sentences.english: Nitrogen topdressed at elongation for different wheat could result in the highest yield.
sentences.chinese: 拔节期是不同类型专用小麦最佳氮肥高产施用期。

sentences.english: For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast .
sentences.chinese: 每逢这节期巡抚必须释放一个囚犯给他们。

sentences.english: For early rice, young panicle formation stage and elongation stage often overlapped.
sentences.chinese: 就早稻而言，稻穗分化期和拔节期几乎同时进行。

sentences.english: Mt. 26:5 But they said, Not at the feast, lest there be an uproar among the people.
sentences.chinese: 太二六5只是他们说，在节期中不可，恐怕民间生乱。

sentences.english: 14Not until halfway through the Feast did Jesus go up to the temple courts and begin to teach.
sentences.chinese: 到了节期，耶稣上殿里去教训人。

sentences.english: Pennsylvania lost half of its peach population last season.
sentences.chinese: 上个节期，宾夕法尼亚州桃子的上市量减少了一半。

sentences.english: The survival rate of nymphs feeding on rice plant at elongation stage was the highest.
sentences.chinese: 若虫以取食拔节期稻株存活率最高。

definition: Sukkot or Succoth, Jewish holiday
Passover (Jewish holiday)
Pentecost

Hanukkah (Chanukah), 8 day Jewish holiday starting on the 25th day of Kislev (can occur from late Nov up to late Dec on Gregorian calendar)/also called 哈努卡節|哈努卡节 and simply 哈努卡
Nisan, the first month of the ecclesiastical year in the Jewish calendar
Whit Sunday (Christian Festival celebrating the Holy Spirit)
Lent (Christian period of forty days before Easter)
fasting days/a fast
Advent (Christian period of 4 weeks before Christmas)
ecumenical
Hanukkah (Chanukah), 8 day Jewish holiday starting on the 25th day of Kislev (can occur from late Nov up to late Dec on Gregorian calendar)/also called 光明節|光明节 and 哈努卡節|哈努卡节
Assumption of the Virgin Mary (Christian festival on 15th August)
First Sunday of Lent
Book of Leviticus/Third Book of Moses
Sabbath/Sunday
